info.name: Query examples - syntax, patterns, special characters

item.name: CreateIndex - custom analyzer (Keyword_v2 tokenizer, lowercase filter)

body.raw:
{
  "fields": [
    {
      "name": "id",
      "type": "Edm.String",
      "facetable": true,
      "filterable": true,
      "key": true,
      "retrievable": true,
      "searchable": false,
      "sortable": false,
      "analyzer": null,
      "indexAnalyzer": null,
      "searchAnalyzer": null,
      "synonymMaps": [],
      "fields": []
    },
    {
      "name": "testString",
      "type": "Edm.String",
      "facetable": false,
      "filterable": false,
      "key": false,
      "retrievable": true,
      "searchable": true,
      "sortable": false,
      "analyzer": "my-keyword-analyzer",
      "indexAnalyzer": null,
      "searchAnalyzer": null,
      "synonymMaps": [],
      "fields": []
    },
    {
      "name": "longerText",
      "type": "Edm.String",
      "facetable": false,
      "filterable": false,
      "key": false,
      "retrievable": true,
      "searchable": true,
      "sortable": false,
      "analyzer": null,
      "indexAnalyzer": null,
      "searchAnalyzer": null,
      "synonymMaps": [],
      "fields": []
    }
  ],
  "scoringProfiles": [],
  "defaultScoringProfile": null,
  "corsOptions": null,
  "analyzers": [
  	  {
      "name": "my-keyword-analyzer",
      "@odata.type": "#Microsoft.Azure.Search.CustomAnalyzer",
      "charFilters":[],
      "tokenizer": "keyword_v2",
      "tokenFilters":["lowercase"]
	   }
  	],
  "charFilters": [],
  "tokenFilters": [],
  "tokenizers": [],
  "@odata.etag": "\"0x8D6FB2F498F9AD2\""
}

item.name: QueryDocs - empty search, get doc count (*)
QueryDocs - wildcard search ? and * (980?2*) - full syntax
QueryDocs - wildcard pattern (/.*??? 0A?.*/) - use regex for ? initial char
QueryDocs - wildcard suffix search (/.*numeric.*/) - full syntax
QueryDocs - partial term (/.*10-NOR.*/) - use custom or lang analyzer
QueryDocs - URL, escaping https://* - requires custom analyzer
QueryDocs - GUID with hyphen - use custom or lang analyzer
QueryDocs - special char (% and ?) - use lang analyzer
QueryDocs - mouse/mice, goose/geese - use lang analyzer
QueryDocs - NOT query searchMode=any|all  - anomaly in search
